attributes.action: Extend the smoking ban to the Palace of Westminster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the Government are adamant about the dangers of passive smoking and have extended the ban to all workplaces 
apart from those classed as homes,it is only fair that staff working in the Westminster bars are also "protected" from passive smoking and it would also
show that the MP's are committed to 
the principles of the ban and are happy to accept the restrictions shortly to be enforced on UK smokers in general.
The excuse that it is a royal palace
should not be relevant as it cannot be classed as a home,but as a place of work and using that as a loophope sends out a "do as we say not as we do message"

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
